Package display

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
display.Display
display.Menu
public class Menu
extends Display
The Menu class is a Display that represents the options that the user has regarding the program
Author:
roshnibright

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu​(double x, double y, double width, double height, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color strokeColor, java.awt.Color fillColor)
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the start point
      y - y-coordinate of the start point
      width - width of the Menu
      height - height of the Menu
      strokeWeight - weight of the stroke to draw the Menu
      strokeColor - color of the stroke to draw the Menu
      fillColor - inner color of the Menu
